WorkItem.Description: When the scores and values are being calculated when the page refreshes, it takes 1:13 mins to get the code for the utility edit box to show. Upon further investigation it appears that all the urls  for the tools that are fetching server data for calculation seem to be executing syncronously instead of async. Page load times must be reduced and the scripts/events need to be used/fetched async.
WorkItem.Summary: Page really slow to load when values are being calculated

Comments.Message: I believe that delaying the actual scoreboard redraw to process several score updates at once may have resolved this issue. I'll mark it as fixed for now, but we'll keep an eye on it.
